text.section:
To apply for a certificate, an applicant shall:
Submit an application to the Board on the form that the Board requires;
Pay to the Board the application fee set by the Board; and
Provide fingerprints for use by the Criminal Justice Information System Central Repository of the Department of Public Safety and Correctional Services to conduct a State and national criminal history records check.

section.section: An applicant required to provide fingerprints under subsection (a)(3) of this section shall pay any processing or other fees required by the Criminal Justice Information System Central Repository of the Department of Public Safety and Correctional Services.
The results of the criminal history records check shall be provided to the Board and the applicant.
